channel.title: Elm on Lorenzo Arribas

item.title: SchoolHouse.io
item.description: I am one of the co-founders of SchoolHouse.io, an ed-tech startup that’s been on production since late 2016 and now helps hundreds of teachers provide a better experience to their students. On the technical side, we are a 2-person team (@hecrj and I) who take care of the full stack, from graphical design to deployment and infrastructure monitoring. Main challenges Building interactive presentations in real time with WebSocket.
